price: Je! Wameambizana kwa haya? Bali hawa ni watu waasi.
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
footnotes: Je! Mmeusiana, mmeambizana, nyinyi kwa nyinyi kusema hivyo ndio maana mnalirejea hilo kwa hilo? Bali hao ni watu walio pindukia mipaka, ndio wakawafikiana katika kuwashutumu Mitume!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
